law.catch_line: Authorization of electronic payment methods for deposit in State Treasury -- Provider fees.

text.section: Any fees charged to a state agency by the provider of the payment services listed in subsection (1) of this section shall be deemed to represent collection expenses and may be considered normal operating expenses of the agency, or the agency may collect convenience fees from users to supplement agency costs of delivering services.

law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003.
